message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to negotiate, but not to that extent. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering our previous discussions.
